name: Industrial Infection!
description:
A Simulation / Management Game

Be in charge of your own big medicin corporation and design your very own diseases - the sell the cure to the people infected!

Make sure not to make your diseases too leather, but also not too mild - keep the world sick, but not dying!

Features

  • Over 20 Symptoms to choose from.
  • Custom design your disease with transmissions and resistances.
  • Outsmart your competitors.
  • Minimalistic Artstyle.
